requiredEquipmentExplanation: The video metadata clearly emphasizes that the workout is designed to be performed without any equipment. The title of the video explicitly states 'No Equipment, No Repeats', and this is reinforced in the description, which mentions it is 'equipment free.' Furthermore, the tags include phrases like 'no equipment abs workout' and 'equipment free abs,' which suggest that no additional items are necessary to perform these exercises. Although there is a mention of a mat used by the instructor in one of the promotional links, this is not implied to be a requirement for the workout itself. Therefore, it can be concluded with high confidence that the workout is intended to be bodyweight only and does not necessitate any additional equipment.
